articles.title: Enlarged Meeting of WPK Central Military Commission Held under Guidance of Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Enlarged Meeting of WPK Central Military Commission Held under Guidance of Kim Jong Un
Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- An enlarged meeting of the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) took place under the guidance of Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the WPK, chairman of the Central Military Commission of the WPK, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 Attending the meeting were members of the Central Military Commission of the WPK, executive members of the KPA Committee of the WPK and commanding officers of services and corps-level units.
					
					 The participants observed a moment's silence in memory of leader Kim Jong Il at the proposal of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The meeting discussed important strategic issues of bringing about a radical turn in the overall work for national defence as required by the prevailing situation and developing revolution and an organizational matter.
					
					 Kim Jong Un made a historic speech.
					
					 He said that over the past three years since the demise of Kim Jong Il the service personnel of the KPA have safeguarded the WPK and the revolution with pure conscience and clear mind, regarding the loyalty to the party and leader and moral obligation as dearer than their own lives despite the graver situation at home and abroad than ever before.
					
					 The enlarged meeting is of weighty significance in clearly indicating the future orientation of building the army for carrying out the behests of Kim Jong Il and letting the People's Army, the main force for the Songun revolution, win victories in defending socialism and all sectors for building a thriving nation this year so as to successfully greet the 70th anniversaries of the WPK and the liberation of the country as grand political festivals, he noted.
					
					 He reviewed the work of the KPA last year and set forth the ways of carrying out its work for this year.
					
					 Last year the service personnel of the KPA grew stronger in their faith and will to hold President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal sun of Juche and accomplish the revolutionary cause of Songun under the guidance of the party and the politico-ideological might and combat capabilities of the KPA were remarkably bolstered up and the foundation for supply service was consolidated to open a prospect for satisfactorily solving the issue of service personnel's living, he said.
					
					 He pointed to the deviations manifested in the work of the KPA last year and set forth a strategic line to be always held fast to by the KPA which has a responsible duty of national defence and tasks and ways for developing the revolutionary armed forces.
					
					 He underlined the need to implement the line of making the KPA politically, ideologically and morally stronger as required by the developing reality in which the cause of Juche-oriented army-building has reached a higher level.
					
					 Emphasizing the need for the KPA to focus all its efforts on rounding off combat readiness this year, he said to this end, it was necessary to simplify the machinery of the KPA and indicated the orientation and ways for reorganizing the machinery in such a way as to realize the strategic intention of the Supreme Command any time.
					
					 Calling on the KPA to be fully ready to react to any form of war to be ignited by the enemy, he clarified the methods of fighting a war with the U.S. imperialists and corresponding operational and tactical matters.
					
					 Our revolution advances, keeping pace with the KPA, and the pace of the KPA precisely means the speed of the advance of our revolution, he said, adding that the KPA should dash ahead like the wind in the van to be followed by the whole country in its speed and thus bring earlier a rosy future of the great Paektusan nation.

articles.title: Greetings to Sultan of Brunei Darussalam
articles.content:
Greetings to Sultan of Brunei Darussalam
Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Monday sent a message of greeting to Haji Hassanal Bolkiah, sultan and head of state of Brunei Darussalam, on the occasion of its national day.
					 The message said that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries have steadily been consolidated despite the complicated international situation in recent years, wishing the people of Brunei Darussalam progress and prosperity.

articles.title: Greetings to Minister of Foreign Affairs and Trade of Brunei Darussalam
articles.content:
Greetings to Minister of Foreign Affairs and Trade of Brunei Darussalam
Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong Monday sent a message of greeting to Mohamed Bolkiah, minister of Foreign Affairs and Trade of Brunei Darussalam, on its national day.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries that have developed on a new higher stage in recent years would grow stronger in line with the common interests and desire of the peoples of the two countries and wished him greater success in his responsible work.

articles.title: Choe Thae Bok Meets Lao Ambassador
articles.content:
Choe Thae Bok Meets Lao Ambassador
Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, chairman of the Supreme People's Assembly, had a talk with Lao Ambassador to the DPRK Kiettisak Keobanhdith who paid a farewell call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Monday.

articles.title: Celebrations Take Place at DPRK Missions Abroad
articles.content:
Celebrations Take Place at DPRK Missions Abroad
Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Celebrations took place at the DPRK missions overseas from Feb. 12 to 15 to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il. They included receptions, book and photo exhibitions, round-table talks and film shows at the DPRK missions in Thailand, Myanmar, Iran, India, Nepal, Bangladesh, Bulgaria, Britain, France, Peru, Brazil, Mexico, Egypt, Equatorial Guinea, Ethiopia, Senegal and Algeria and the DPRK permanent mission in the UN.
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were photos documenting the immortal exploits of President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on display there were works of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu and books and photos introducing the service personnel and people of the DPRK who are accelerating the final victory of the Juche revolution in the revolutionary spirit of Paektu.
					
					 Films shown included Korean films "Arms of Korea" and "Fireworks of a Thriving Nation."
					
					 Present at the events on invitation were personages of governments, political parties, military, organizations and institutions of relevant countries, representatives of international and regional bodies and NGOs, foreign diplomats and members of organizations for friendship and solidarity with the Korean people and organizations for the study of the Juche idea.

articles.title: DPRK Government Economic Delegation Leaves for Russia
articles.content:
DPRK Government Economic Delegation Leaves for Russia
Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- A DPRK government economic delegation led by Ri Ryong Nam, minister of External Economic Relations, left here on Monday to visit Russia.

articles.title: Russian Ambassador Gives Reception
articles.content:
Russian Ambassador Gives Reception
Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Russian Ambassador to the DPRK Alexandr Matsegora and Military Attache Alexei Bartusov gave a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Club on Monday on the occasion of the Day of Defenders of the Motherland.
					 Present there on invitation were No Kwang Chol,  vice-chief of the General Staff of the Korean People's Army, generals and other officers of the KPA, officials concerned, diplomatic envoys and military attaches of different countries here.

articles.title: Russian Embassy Officials Place Wreaths before Liberation Tower and Cemetery of Fallen Fighters of Soviet Army
articles.content:
Russian Embassy Officials Place Wreaths before Liberation Tower and Cemetery of Fallen Fighters of Soviet Army
Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Staff members of the Russian embassy here laid a wreath before the Liberation Tower on Monday on the occasion of the Day of Defenders of the Motherland.
					 Present at the wreath-laying ceremony were Alexandr Matsegora, Russian ambassador to the DPRK; Alexei Bartusov, Russian military attache; and other Russian embassy officials and foreign military attaches here.
					
					 After a wreath in the name of the Russian embassy was placed before the Liberation Tower, the participants observed a moment's silence in memory of the fallen fighters of the Soviet Army.
					
					 Then the Russian embassy officials placed a wreath and flowers before the cemetery of the fallen fighters of the Soviet Army in Sadong District, Pyongyang City.
					
					 Meanwhile, they laid bouquets before the statues of the Soviet army, towers of liberation and monuments to fallen soldiers of the Soviet army in local areas.

articles.title: Songdowon Camp Crowded with Children in Every Season
articles.content:
Songdowon Camp Crowded with Children in Every Season
Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- The Songdowon International Children's Camp in the DPRK is crowded with campers even in winter season.
					 Many schoolchildren from across the country now enjoy pleasant days at the camp noted for its beach.
					
					 The campers can be seen playing ski, skate and sledge at the Masikryong Ski Resort near the camp.
					
					 Their happy looks are also witnessed in such places of the camp as aquarium housing turtle, shark, ray and other rare sea fishes and animals, and mirror house, 4-D simulation cinema, video games room, indoor wading pool and gymnasium.
					
					 On February 23 last year, supreme leader Kim Jong Un visited the camp, seeing to it that the camp was renovated more wonderfully and a railway station was built exclusively for its campers.

articles.title: Natural Pigments Extracted from Black Sweet Potato
articles.content:
Natural Pigments Extracted from Black Sweet Potato
Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- The Life Science Faculty of Kim Il Sung University has recently succeeded in extracting natural pigments from black sweet potato (Ipomoea batatas Lam).
					 Ipomoea batatas Lam, known to be one of health foodstuffs, is abundant in medicinal substances.
					
					 Researchers of the faculty developed a new technology of extracting natural pigments from it, after having succeeded in cultivating it under the climate and soil conditions of Korea. 
					
					The natural pigments are applicable to making anti-oxidation drinks and anthocyan, an organic compound which is formed in the process of extraction, is used in manufacturing eye lotions.

articles.title: Sandy Dust Observed in DPRK
articles.content:
Sandy Dust Observed in DPRK
Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Sandy dust has been observed in the DPRK from about 12:00 of February 21. 
					 The dust, which came from the Great Gobi and Inner Mongolian region of China, affected some areas of the western seaside of Korea, but as of 12:00 of Monday it has been observed not only in the most west coastal areas but in some areas of Jagang, Ryanggang and Kangwon provinces.
					
					 Experts say that the dust is of high density.
					
					 Citizens are recommended to put on glasses and masks and lavage nasal fossa and pharynx with mild salt water.

articles.title: Bereaved Families Declare Actions for Probing Truth about Ferry Sewol Disaster
articles.content:
Bereaved Families Declare Actions for Probing Truth about Ferry Sewol Disaster
Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Bereaved families of the ferry Sewol disaster in south Korea declared that they would conduct actions in the U.S. in demand of the probe into the truth about the ferry Sewol sinking accident, according to a south Korean internet paper on Feb. 15.
					 They expressed the will to completely reveal the truth about the ferry tragedy and the distorted facts and the conflict over the ferry Sewol special law.
					
					 They also expressed their determination to positively conduct the actions to salvage the sunken ferry in solidarity with Korean compatriots so as to clearly probe the truth about the accident.
					
					 To this end, they will hold round-table talks and lectures in New York, Los Angeles and other parts of the U.S. from March 6 to 15, they stressed.

articles.title: Event of Laying Floral Basket before Photo of Kim Jong Il, Kim Jong Un Held in Russia
articles.content:
Event of Laying Floral Basket before Photo of Kim Jong Il, Kim Jong Un Held in Russia
Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- An event of laying a floral basket before the photo of leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un took place at 11th Middle School in Khabarovsk City, Russia on Feb. 16.
					 Its participants placed the floral basket before the photo at the classroom of the Russia-Korea Children's Friendship Association Named after Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them.
					
					 The principal of the school said:
					
					 It is the honor of our school to hold the meaningful event on the occasion of the birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star).
					
					 The colorful events held at the school on important occasions of the DPRK have deepened the traditional Russia-DPRK relations and the friendship between the children of the two countries.
					
					 The classroom has been used for widely introducing the happy and bright appearance of the Korean children and history and traditions of Korea.
					
					 We will further this work in the future, too.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Lauded in Germany
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Lauded in Germany
Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- The MS Travel Company of Germany posted on its website on Feb. 8 an article titled "February 8, 1948" on the occasion of the 67th anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's strengthening of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army (KPRA) into the regular revolutionary armed forces.
					 The article said:
					
					 The President proclaimed the birth of the regular armed forces of socialist Korea on Feb. 8, 1948.
					
					 He founded the KPRA, predecessor of the Korean People's Army (KPA), on April 25, 1932 and fought a fierce anti-Japanese war that resulted in the liberation of the country on August 15, 1945.
					
					 He made full preparations for building the regular armed forces based on precious experience of building army gained through anti-Japanese war as required by the prevailing situation after the liberation of Korea and the need for building an independent and sovereign state.
					
					 He founded the Pyongyang Institute to train more military and political cadres and made sure that all services and arms were organized, providing a foundation for producing modern arms and equipment necessary for building the regular armed forces.
					
					 A splendid military parade was staged heralding the birth of the KPA on Feb. 8, 1948.
					
					 This day will shine forever in history along with the invincible spirit of the KPA reliably defending socialism in the DPRK and peace and security on the Korean peninsula while completely containing the U.S. and its followers.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Life Introduced by Foreign Papers
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Life Introduced by Foreign Papers
Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Foreign papers carried special write-ups on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The Lao paper Vatelao on Feb. 6 carried an article titled "Mt. Paektu and Comrade Kim Jong Il" illustrated with a portrait depicting his smiling image.
					
					 In its preface the paper said that Mt. Paektu is the highest in Korea, adding that the mountain called the ancestral mountain of the Korean nation, a holy mountain of the Korean revolution, would be unthinkable apart from Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The Iranian paper Teheran Times on Feb. 8 dedicated one whole page to an article titled "Life for future" under the headline "On the 73rd Anniversary of Birth of HE Kim Jong Il" illustrated with his photo.
					
					 It said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il dedicated his all to bringing into full bloom the rosy future of Korea.
					
					 He firmly maintained the principle of giving more importance to the morrow than present all his life.
					
					 He organized everything in a bold way and pushed ahead with it at the highest speed all his life, bringing earlier future. 
					
					 His whole life was the one of noble dedication to the bright future of the country and people.
					
					 The Myanmar paper The New Age on Feb. 5 carried an article titled "Kim Jong Il, great master of independent politics" illustrated with a portrait depicting his smiling image and a photo of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The paper stressed that the Songun politics is the most important one among political exploits performed by Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Personage of Regional Body
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Personage of Regional Body
Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Jose Francisco Aguilar Bulgarelli, honorary chairman of the Latin American Institute of the Juche Idea, made public a statement on Feb. 11 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The honorary chairman said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il achieved single-minded unity of the leader, party and masses and wisely led the Korean people to successfully build the socialist power of Juche by relying on their wisdom and efforts.
					
					 He pursued the Songun politics on the principle of attaching importance to the military affairs and giving precedence to it, thereby defending socialist Korea and global cause of socialism. He made sure that the historic June 15 North-South Joint Declaration was adopted, an immortal contribution to the cause of independent and peaceful reunification of Korea.
					
					 He made ceaseless journey for field guidance for the happiness of the Korean people.
					
					 The exploits he performed for the Korean revolution and the global cause of socialism will always be remembered by the Korean people and progressives.
					
					 I extend firm solidarity to the Korean people in their drive to build a socialist economic power, a highly civilized country and achieve independent and peaceful reunification of the country.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Off Press in Finland
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Off Press in Finland
Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Step Up the Building of a Thriving Country by Applying Kim Jong Il's Patriotism" was brought out in booklet by the Finnish National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea.
					 The work, published on July 26, Juche 101 (2012), clarifies the essence of Kim Jong Il's patriotism and his whole life characterized by his warm love for the country and people.
					
					 It also indicates the important issues arising in embodying Kim Jong Il's patriotism.
					
					 A book-releasing ceremony took place in Helsinki on Feb. 12.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige reunion ampliada de la CMC de PTC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige reunion ampliada de la CMC de PTC
Pyongyang, 23 de febrero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar la reunion ampliada de la Comision Militar Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea bajo la direccion de Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del PTC, Presidente de la CMC del PTC, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					En la ocasion tomaron parte los miembros de la CMC, los miembros ejecutivos del Comite del PTC en el EPC y los comandantes de los tipos de ejercito y de las unidades del nivel de cuerpo del EPC.
					
					A propuesta de Kim Jong Un, los participantes guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					La reunion debatio importantes asuntos estrategicos para producir un viraje en todas las labores de defensa nacional conforme a la situacion creada y a la demanda de la revolucion en desarrollo y abordo el problema de organizacion.
					
					Kim Jong Un pronuncio un discurso historico.
					
					Aunque fue mas severa que nunca la situacion interna y externa durante 3 anos pasados desde el deceso del Dirigente, el EPC defendio nuestro Partido y revolucion con la conciencia limpia apreciando mas que la vida la fidelidad y la obligacion moral al Partido y el Lider, dijo.
					
					Apunto que la presente reunion tiene mucha importancia en celebrar el aniversario 70 de la fundacion del PTC y de la liberacion de la patria como grandes festivales politicos, al definir claramente el rumbo de construccion del ejercito para materializar los legados del Dirigente y hacer al EPC, grueso de la revolucion del Songun, lograr victorias este ano en la defensa del socialismo y todas las esferas de edificacion de un Estado prospero.
					
					Analizo y balanceo las gestiones del EPC del ano pasado y presento el rumbo de trabajo en este ano.
					
					Prosiguio que en el ano pasado, en el EPC se tornaron mas firmes la conviccion y voluntad de los oficiales y soldados del EPC de llevar a feliz termino bajo la guia del partido la causa revolucionaria del Songun enalteciendo para siempre al Presidente Kim Il Sung y al Dirigente Kim Jong Il como Sol del Juche, crecio considerablemente el poderio ideo-politico y combativo del EPC y se preparo la solida base de intendencia abriendo las posibilidades de solucionar los problemas de vida de los militares.
					
					Senalo los defectos surgidos en las labores del EPC en el ano pasado, aclaro la linea estrategica a mantener por el EPC, encargado de la mision responsable de defensa nacional, e indico las tareas y remedios para fortalecer las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias.
					
					Tomando en cuenta las demandas de la realidad en desarrollo en que nuestra autoctona causa de construccion del ejercito entra en una nueva etapa mas alta, hay que mantener la linea de convertir el ejercito en el fuerte en la politica, ideologia y moral, asevero.
					
					Destaco la necesidad de concentrar todas las fueras en completar este ano los preparativos de combate en el EPC y para este fin, instruyo el rumbo y remedios para arreglar y simplificar el sistema de aparatos del EPC y reestructurarlo a fin de cumplir en cualquier momento el intento estrategico de la Comandancia Suprema.
					
					El EPC debe mantenerse en la perfecta movilizacion de combate para que pueda enfrentarse a cualquier modo de guerra que impongan los enemigos, indico y aclaro el modo de cumplimiento de guerra, que tendra el EPC sin falta contra el imperialismo norteamericano, y los correspondientes problemas operacionales y tacticos.
					
					Apunto que el segundero del reloj de nuestra revolucion marcha a la velocidad de los pasos del EPC y esta es precisamente la de avance de nuestra revolucion.
					
					El EPC debe avanzar a todo galope al frente y todo el pais tiene que ajustar los pasos a la velocidad de ataque del EPC para adelantar cuanto antes el futuro maravilloso de la potencia del monte Paektu, exhorto.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia ofrenda floral ante feretro de difunto Paek Po Hum
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia ofrenda floral ante feretro de difunto Paek Po Hum
Pyongyang, 23 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un envio el dia 22 una ofrenda floral ante el feretro del difunto Paek Po Hum, laureado con el Premio Kim Il Sung y el Premio Kim Jong Il y escritor del Colectivo de Creacion Literaria 15 de Abril, en senal de  profundas condolencias por su fallecimiento.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita efemeride de Brunei Darussalam
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita efemeride de Brunei Darussalam
Pyongyang, 23 de febrero (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam envio el dia 23 un mensaje de felicitacion al Sultan y Jefe del Estado de Brunei Darussalam, Haji Hassanal Bolkiah, con motivo del dia nacional de este pais.
					En la misiva el remitente senalo que se han fortalecido y desarrollado sin cesar las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre ambos paises, aun en medio de la complicada situacion internacional de estos ultimos anos, y formulo votos por el progreso y la prosperidad del pueblo de Brunei Darussalam.

articles.title: Parte delegacion economica gubernamental hacia Rusia
articles.content:
Parte delegacion economica gubernamental hacia Rusia
Pyongyang, 23 de febrero (ACNC) -- La delegacion economica del gobierno de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea encabezada por el ministro de Relaciones Economicas con el Extranjero, Ri Ryong Nam, partio el dia 23 de esta capital para realizar una visita a Rusia.

articles.title: Miembros de embajada rusa rinden tributo a martires del ejercito sovietico
articles.content:
Miembros de embajada rusa rinden tributo a martires del ejercito sovietico
Pyongyang, 23 de febrero (ACNC) -- Con motivo del Dia de Defensores de la Patria, los miembros de la embajada rusa en Corea depositaron el dia 23 una ofrenda floral ante el Monumento a la Liberacion.
					En la ceremonia de homenaje participaron el embajador Alexandr Matsegora, el agregado militar Alexei Bartusov y otros miembros de la sede diplomatica rusa y los agregados militares de las embajadas de varios paises en Corea. 
					
					Despues de depositarla, los participantes guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria de los martires del ejercito sovietico.
					
					Luego, los miembros de la sede diplomatica rusa en Corea colocaron una ofrenda y ramos de flores ante la tumba de los martires del ejercito sovietico en el capitalino municipio de Sadong.
					
					Ellos depositaron tambien los ramos de flores ante las estatuas de bronce del ejercito sovietico, el monumento a la liberacion y el monumento en memoria del ejercito sovietico en distintas localidades.
